request.description:
1. MB date should not accept future date
2. MB date  >= WO and LOA date
3. If offline status is mandatory for regular then we need to check MB date >= work commencement date

"Any New MB,
MB date >= all its previous MB date (if previous MB exists) excluding cancelled MBs"
MB issue date should be prior to MB date
Atleast one MB details is mandatory (can be Tendered / non tendered / lumpsum)

1. Legacy MB, MB date is user entered and it can past date.
2. Legacy MB can only be for spill over WO and LOA
3. In case of legacy, approved date = mb date. In case of regular approved date is based on status change(Approved status)
